channel.title: Authors on AI Square
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on AI Square

item.title: Nicolas Duval
item.description: With an impressive background as a seasoned software engineer boasting over 16 years of experience, Nicolas has made significant contributions to major software releases at industry giants like Autodesk and Adobe. Recognizing the potential for innovation and growth, Nicolas chose to take on the challenge of co-founding AI Square and become the CTO, applying his expertise to propel the company’s technological advancements.

item.title: Louis Boka
item.description: After playing a key role in four successful startups across Europe, America and Asia, Louis pivoted from engineering to become a founder, concentrating on sales as the CEO of AI Square. Over the course of his career, Louis collaborated with clients in a wide range of industries and regions, gaining deep insights into the challenges they face. This exposure not only allowed him to establish a diverse network of potential customers but also equipped him with the expertise to create customized value propositions for AI Square’s solutions, effectively boosting the company’s growth and reach.
